lead_paragraph: New Zealand Cricket (NZC) confirmed on Thursday that top-order batsman Kane Williamson will take over the captaincy in all three formats of the game following the retirement of Brendon McCullum.

headline.print_headline: New Zealand Confirm Williamson as Skipper
headline.main: New Zealand Confirm Williamson as Skipper

snippet: New Zealand Cricket (NZC) confirmed on Thursday that top-order batsman Kane Williamson will take over the captaincy in all three formats of the game following the retirement of Brendon McCullum....
